name: House of Symbolism
description:
The House of Symbolism is a symbolic game for those who love mystical games. Elements of conspiracy theories can be seen in the game. Conspiracy theories have always been interesting to people.

You will play as a person who was returning to his home in a car after work. Suddenly, something terrible happened to the man in the car! But what happened, you will see in the game, I do not want to reveal this interesting plot here.

The game features mystical creatures, ghosts, skeletons, zombies, dark silhouettes, reptilians and other characters. Wandering around the old house, you can see the symbols of the Freemasons and Illuminati. Horror adventure, darkness and horror await you in this scary house.

Gloomy music accompaniment and sounds will not let you relax throughout the game. Frightening sounds, screamers will make you grip your mobile device tightly.

Beautiful graphics, atmospheric plot will plunge you headlong into this mystical bedtime story. The fabulous cradle will arrange a hot night for you. The creaks of the old house doors are about to let you into their decrepit house of fear. The house of horror will give you goosebumps. Well, stop reading this! Forward to storm the abandoned house! Is it abandoned?

Want to know how deep the rabbit hole is? Then follow the white rabbit!
